descriptionHtml:
This is the Chinese translation of mod Skyrim Redone. Thanks for T3nd0\'s permission of this translation. 

At this point only SkyRe_Main.esp has been translated. The rest esp files are planned to be finished in the future.

If you want to use this, you have to download original mod and install it first. You can find it here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9286.

For more information and details in Chinese, you can find them in this page http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-3243386-1-1.html.


[size=4]Requirements[/size]

V1.6 Skyrim or higher required


[size=4]Installation[/size]

Install the original mod and 099142 update first. Then copy the translated esp into skyrim/data directory.


[size=4]Credits[/size]

All credits are given to Author T3nd0 and all who have contributed to this great mod!


If you like this MOD, please endorse the author, thanks!
author: loveltzzm
